tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MachineMaintenanceRecords (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR,
    technician_name VARCHAR,
    maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE machine_maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE machine_inventory (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR(100),
    installation_date DATE,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE machine_maintenance_records (
  record_id INT,
  machine_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE machine (
    machine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID REFERENCES machine(machine_id),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE spare_parts (
    part_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    part_description TEXT,
    part_quantity INT,
    last_ordered_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID REFERENCES machine(machine_id),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    planned_maintenance_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE machine_info (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (machine_id) REFERENCES machine_info(machine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    next_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_interval INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (machine_id) REFERENCES machine_info(machine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE machine_faults (
    fault_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    fault_description TEXT,
    fault_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (machine_id) REFERENCES machine_info(machine_id)
);
